author: afdudley
content:
> We initiated the testnet, for the moment only 3 Besu nodes on this network. I am waiting for EIP-1559 support for Clique engine in Geth before deploying Geth nodes. We will likely restart this testnet many times before having something stable. Here are the urls of the stats dashboard and the block explorer:
> http://eip1559-testnet.ops.pegasys.tech:3001/
> http://eip1559-testnet.ops.pegasys.tech:3000/
> I will share genesis later when we are ready to open to other nodes.
